text: Under both clean and dirty conditions, a concentrationdependent virucidal activity was seen with the PVP-I only products (Table 1) . Under dirty conditions, the minimum concentration of PVP-I needed for a 4 log 10 reduction of MVA was 5.3 times higher at a 30 s contact time (0.4 g/L versus 0.075 g/L) and 4 times higher at a 15 s contact time (0.4 g/L versus 0.1 g/L), than under clean conditions ( Table 1) .
